title: Nuggets President Tim Connelly on advancing to the Western Conference Finals
description:
Denver Nuggets President of Basketball Operations Tim Connelly joins The Woj Pod to discuss the Nuggets' wild ride to the Western Conference Finals, constructing the best young roster in the league, resisting trading Jamal Murray for established veteran All-Stars, fighting self-doubt as a young GM, turning down offers to leave Denver, and much more. 
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
itunes:author: ESPN, Adrian Wojnarowski
